ThingDef.label: tentacle cluster
ThingDef.description: Adding a small amount of manipulator tentacles on the host backs can increase their ability to work.

ThingDef.label: serrated stinger tail
ThingDef.description: By applying the same principles of creating a bone saber to a new limb, a tail extremity can be created that is just as deadly.

ThingDef.label: manipulator tail
ThingDef.description: A large bundle of nerves and muscles that are just as dextrous as a normal hand, this tail allows the host to have more appendages when doing manual labor.
